Text: Seasons Greetingsjust opened the holiday card with the group photo Great picture It shows how beautiful the weather is in Portland When our group used to do pictures we usually ended up looking into the sun just like you We end up squinting but otherwise it makes a good picture Thank you for thinking of me Be sure to show this to Bob Badeer since I do not have his email address May God bless you all with a wonderful holiday season and may we all be exempt from refunds
